alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds containing a mercury atom.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic mercury compounds

class.description: Inorganic compounds containing only metal atoms of at least two different types, where the heaviest atom is a transition metal.
class.name: Intermetallic transition metal compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as intermetallic transition metal compounds. These are inorganic compounds containing only metal atoms of at least two different types, where the heaviest atom is a transition metal.

direct_parent.description: Inorganic compounds containing only metal atoms of at least two different types, where the heaviest atom is a transition metal.
direct_parent.name: Intermetallic transition metal compounds

kingdom.description: Compounds that do not contain a C atom. Exceptions are made for isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon trioxide, carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Inorganic compounds

superclass.description: Inorganic compounds that contain only metal atoms.
superclass.name: Homogeneous metal compounds
